author: Times Of India
title: Rahul Gandhi asks govt to bring back Indian workers stuck in Middle East
description: India News: He said the workers are in deep distress there due to shutting of businesses in the Middle East due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
content:
The #Covid19 crisis & shutting of businesses in the Middle East have left thousands of Indian workers in deep distr https://t.co/p2xjAXkJ1i
